title: We Are Not DJs
dc:creator: Jon Smajda
description: This episode, we talk about Black Friday mania, Girl Talk, John Stewart, and Wikileaks. Follow along at home: Netflix queues and procrastination Atheists Launch Real War on Christmas. With Billboards. Girl Talk Gimme Shelter Dissected John Stewart and Rachel Maddow Interview Assange’s philosophy Download our 19th attempt at Improvisational Sociology.
content:encoded:
This episode, we talk about Black Friday mania, Girl Talk, John Stewart, and Wikileaks.

Follow along at home:

  • Netflix queues and procrastination
  • Atheists Launch Real War on Christmas. With Billboards.
  • Girl Talk
  • Gimme Shelter Dissected
  • John Stewart and Rachel Maddow Interview
  • Assange’s philosophy

Download our 19th attempt at Improvisational Sociology.
